amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the National Endowment for the Arts by $5 million and funding for the National Endowment for the Humanities by $5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding (by transfer) for the National Endowment for the Arts and the National Endowment for the Humanities by $5 million each.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Slaughter amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Slaughter.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Slaughter amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
